<div class="treeview">
<onlyinclude>** {{nbt|list|minecraft:pot_decorations}}: A list of the items (typically pottery sherds or bricks) applied on each face of this [[decorated pot]]. If the list is specified with less than 4 entries, the remaining ones default to {{cd|"minecraft:brick"}}. The first entry is the front face of the pot, and subsequent entries are the faces going clockwise around the pot. If this component is present on an item, the item's tooltip will list the translated names of each of the items in the same order.
*** {{nbt|string}}: The ID of an item. Can be either {{cd|brick}} or a [[sherd]]. <!--
